checkAccountDetails(BussinessAccount) - Static method in class querys.Query
this method check if the details of the business account from the Branch Manager equals to the details from the import_users.
checkAccountKind(String) - Static method in class querys.Query
This method meant to check if the customer that entered the system is a business client and if he does- gets the budget and the company name and code from the DB
CheckAccountStatusActive(String) - Static method in class querys.Query
this method return if the status of the client is active.
CheckAccountStatusFreeze(String) - Static method in class querys.Query
this method return if the status of the client is freeze.
checkEmployerStatus(String) - Static method in class querys.Query
this method returns true of false to the Branch Manager if the company is approved or not.
checkJoin(String) - Static method in class querys.Query
This method meant to check if the client can join to the shared delivery.
checkPrivateAccount(Client) - Static method in class querys.Query
this method check if the details of the private client from the Branch Manager is equals to the details in the import_users table.
checkRefund(Order) - Static method in class querys.Query
The method checks if the costumer deserves to get a refund due to delays of order supply and also updates the refund that the customer deserves in the refund table- if he has no refund for the specific restaurant it will create one, otherwise-calculate the new amount of the refund
checkSupplier(Supplier) - Static method in class querys.Query
this method check if the supplier company name equals to the supplier certified and approved in the DB.
checkYearAndQuarter(String, String) - Static method in class querys.Query
this method return true or false if there is already report for the year and quarter given.
ClientConnection - Class in extra
A function that connects the client to the server and through it you can get or set the: hostName, ipAddress and status.

A function that connects the client to the server and through it you can get or set the: hostName, ipAddress and status.
